p: In the 1970s, HFRS was in completely Apodemus-type natural focal state in Shandong. Then the Apodemus-type focus in the southeastern part of Linyi and the Rattus-type focus in the southern part of Jining began to expand and merge with each other, and formed two foci in the 1980s, one mixed focus dominated by Apodemus-type in the hilly area of the southern and middle part of Shandong, another one dominated by the Rattus-type in the Yellow River valley of the northwestern part of Shandong. In the 1990s, Shandong Province formed a mixed focus dominated by Rattus-type, and entered a stable stage[ 15].
